    ArgsNotValidatedException  
    AsciiColor
    ANSI color to have a nicer CLI
    Bag<T>
    this interface represent a bag of elements of type T
    CachedAmmoBag
    Simplified version of the ammo bag inside model to store information for clients
    CachedAmmoCell
    Simplified version of the Ammo Cell inside model to store the ammo card inside the cells
    CachedCell
    Simplified version of the Cell class in model
    CachedFullWeapon
    Class to store all the information about a weapon needed by a user to forward a shoot It contains every effect cost, reload cost, effect descriptions, and effect requirements so that the interface knows what to ask the player to shoot with a specific weapon
    CachedGame
    Simplified version of the CurrentGame model class to store the kill shot track informations
    CachedLobby
    Class to store the updates sent from server which stores the names of the currently connected players waiting to join the game
    CachedMap
    Simplified version of the map to store local information about cells such as ammo and waepon which can be bought Note that the cached map doesn't have any cell adjacences, this can be retrieved by asking the server if from the current position the direction is valid or not (there's a wall or the map border)
    CachedPowerUp
    Simplified version of the PowerUp contained in the Model, needed to store powerups in player's powerups bag
    CachedPowerUpBag
    Simplified version of the PowerUp bag in Model to store which powerup a player has in hand
    CachedSpawnCell
    This class contains a simplified version of the Spawn cell in model, to store the informations about weapons which can be bought
    CachedStats
    Simplifed verision of the Model Player's stats, which contains informations about dmg, marks, positions, deaths
    CachedWeaponBag
    Simplified version of the WeaponBag model class to store the weapons possesed by players
    CacheModel
    Simplified version of the model used to store local updates for clients
    CacheModelParser  
    CacheModelParserTest  
    CacheModelTest

    Directions  
    EffectRequirements
    This class is useful for CachedFullWeapons effect to determine which requests are needed to be asked to the User Interfaces to shoot with a weapon
    EffectType
    Effect type of a single weapon, they can be EXCLUSIVE if you can chose only alternatevely between base or first effect, CONCATENABLE if you can choose other effects but only in order, CONCATENABLE_NON_ORD for weapons whose first effect can be done before base effect
    FileRead
    Helpers Class to read the CLI map from a file using a defined character convetion The Map is read from a file and populates a matrix of char, which can then be manipulated to update the players and other objects inside the map to have an interactive version of the CLI map

    Skull
    This class represents the skull on the map
    SocketClient
    This class will start a SocketClient which starts another thread, SocketClientReader, which keep listening to messages from SocketConnectionWriter.
    SocketClientReader
    This class handles the socket input stream client-side, allowing to have an async bidirectional communication between client and server.
    SocketClientReaderTest  
    SocketClientWriter  
    SocketConnectionReader
    This class handles the socket input stream server-side.
    SocketConnectionWriter  
    SocketIdentifier
    This class is used to store a single socket connection identifier, which can be distinguished by the pair ip, port
    SocketPing
    This class implements a thread which will send every [DEFAULT_PING_INTERVAL] ms a string "ping" to the client to check if it is still connected to the SocketServer.
    SocketServer
    This thread, started by the main Server, handles a SocketServer that keep listening for connection on the specified port, and open a new socket stream for every client.
